id, base_id, dovecote_id, feed_type, amount,gmt_create, gmt_modified
mapper.select: SELECT f.id, f.base_id, f.dovecote_id, f.feed_type, f.amount,f.gmt_create, f.gmt_modified from t_feed_stock f inner join t_breed_base b on f.`base_id` = b.`id` inner join t_dovecote d on f.`dovecote_id` = d.`dovecote_id` where b.`name` like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{baseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') and d.`dovecote_number` like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{dovecoteNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') and year(f.gmt_modified) = #{year} and month(f.gmt_modified) = #{month}
